(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Notice))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB hereby))
      (VP (VBN given)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP
              (NP (NN registration))
              (PP (IN for)
                (NP (NNP Durian) (NNP Degustation) (NNP XI))))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (ADVP (RB now))
              (VP (VBN opened)))))))
    (. !)))


nsubjpass(given-4, Notice-1)
auxpass(given-4, is-2)
advmod(given-4, hereby-3)
root(ROOT-0, given-4)
mark(opened-13, that-5)
nsubjpass(opened-13, registration-6)
prep(registration-6, for-7)
nn(XI-10, Durian-8)
nn(XI-10, Degustation-9)
pobj(for-7, XI-10)
auxpass(opened-13, is-11)
advmod(opened-13, now-12)
ccomp(given-4, opened-13)


(ROOT
  (PP (VBG Depending)
    (PP (IN on)
      (NP
        (NP (NN supply))
        (PP (IN on)
          (NP (DT that) (NN day)))
        (, ,)))))


root(ROOT-0, Depending-1)
pcomp(Depending-1, on-2)
pobj(on-2, supply-3)
prep(supply-3, on-4)
det(day-6, that-5)
pobj(on-4, day-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (MD should)
      (VP (VB be)
        (NP (NNP tasting) (NNP Mao) (NNP Shan) (NNP Wang))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(Wang-7, we-1)
aux(Wang-7, should-2)
cop(Wang-7, be-3)
nn(Wang-7, tasting-4)
nn(Wang-7, Mao-5)
nn(Wang-7, Shan-6)
root(ROOT-0, Wang-7)

(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Green) (NNP Bamboo))
      (CC and)
      (ADVP (RB hopefully))
      (NP (NNP Black) (NNP Pearl)))
    (. !)))

root(ROOT-0, Bamboo-2)
cc(Bamboo-2, and-3)

nn(Pearl-6, Black-5)
conj(Bamboo-2, Pearl-6)

(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP
      (NP (CD 229) (NNS East))
      (NP (NNP Coast) (NNP Road)
        (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
          (NP (NNP Opp) (NNP Jago) (NNP Close))
          (-RRB- -RRB-))
        (NNP Time)))
    (: :)))


num(East-2, 229-1)
root(ROOT-0, East-2)
nn(Time-10, Coast-3)
nn(Time-10, Road-4)
nn(Close-8, Opp-6)
nn(Close-8, Jago-7)
appos(Time-10, Close-8)
dep(East-2, Time-10)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Write))
      (PP (TO to)
        (CC and)
        (IN in)
        (NP (DT the) (NN title))))
    (VP (VBP write))
    (: :)))

det(title-6, the-5)

(ROOT
  (INTJ (UH ,)))




(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN in)
      (NP (DT the) (JJ email) (NN body)))
    (NP (CD write))
    (: :)))

det(body-4, the-2)
amod(body-4, email-3)
pobj(in-1, body-4)
root(ROOT-0, write-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBG Limit)
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP
          (QP (CD 4) (CD pax))))
      (NP (VB Note)))
    (: :)))


root(ROOT-0, Limit-1)
prep(Limit-1, to-2)
number(pax-4, 4-3)
pobj(to-2, pax-4)
dobj(Limit-1, Note-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (INTJ (VB Please))
    (VP (VB keep)
      (NP (NN everything))
      (ADVP
        (ADVP (RB as) (JJ short)
          (PP (IN as)
            (ADJP (JJ possible))))
        (SBAR (IN so)
          (S
            (NP (PRP we))
            (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
              (ADVP (RB even))
              (VP (VB need)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB open)
                      (NP (DT the) (NN email)
                        (S
                          (VP (TO to)
                            (VP (VB read)
                              (NP (PRP it)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


discourse(keep-2, Please-1)
root(ROOT-0, keep-2)
dobj(keep-2, everything-3)
advmod(short-5, as-4)
advmod(keep-2, short-5)
prep(short-5, as-6)
pobj(as-6, possible-7)
mark(need-13, so-8)
nsubj(need-13, we-9)
aux(need-13, do-10)
neg(need-13, n't-11)
advmod(need-13, even-12)
dep(short-5, need-13)
aux(open-15, to-14)
xcomp(need-13, open-15)
det(email-17, the-16)
dobj(open-15, email-17)
aux(read-19, to-18)
infmod(email-17, read-19)
dobj(read-19, it-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB write)
        (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS greetings))
        (PP (IN after)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ pertinent) (NNS details)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(write-3, You-1)
aux(write-3, can-2)
root(ROOT-0, write-3)
poss(greetings-5, your-4)
dobj(write-3, greetings-5)
prep(write-3, after-6)
det(details-9, the-7)
amod(details-9, pertinent-8)
pobj(after-6, details-9)


(ROOT
  (INTJ (UH Thanks) (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Thanks-1)
